resources.string: Getting people familiar with the event, what we do and all the necessary requirements to participate in the event.\n Here, registration is fundamental because non registered members will not get a seat in the conference.
Here members are allowed to socialize and are given a free hour of pure recreation and relaxation before the main event at night.\n
Here registered members sit and attend the morning session. Speakers and Q and A sessions involved.
Members are allowed an hour break for lunch.
Another evening session where Speakers and Q and A sessions are involved.
Awards are given to the most active participants, and certificated for all attendees of the conference.
Closing remarks from the speakers in the conference, and from special guests. Official end of conference.
